availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Burrell A. Bell (Henderson and Webster County, Kentucky, farm laborer and day laborer.)

body.p: Henderson and Webster County, Kentucky, farm laborer and day laborer. North Carolina native. Married to Sarah Jane Maloney Bell in Henderson County, Kentucky, in June 1854. Father of William J. Bell. Farm laborer in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Day laborer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 335B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 622.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994038, Henderson County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #000576460.
